page.title: 01Farleigh
page.content: Farleigh is in the N.E. corner of the county of Surrey. The council wanted Farleigh to join the G.L.C.in 1955.the people fought this and in 1969 Farleigh came under the authority of a rural church council.There is a village green, a tiny church dating back to Domesday times surrounded by farmland.There is a ditch around the green which stopped cars from spoiling the grass as they stopped for picnics or walks.The sign posts in Farleigh are excellent so you can't get lost.There are also footpath maps.You have to be very careful that you dont go over the farmers fields as you may damage their crops.There are now only two working farms in Farleigh who must pay their rent to Merton College.
